channel.title: How can I add a drop that is given 100% of the time?
channel.description:
This is my code in npcdrops.tsm
[code]#Astea Frostweb 9965:45 452:15 6562:1 555:300 565:100 995:1500000 995:300000 [/code]
But I want to give her lets say bones every time she is killed. How could I do that? I searched everywhere but nothing comes up,

item.title: How can I add a drop that is given 100% of the time?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

if(npc == 9965) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 384, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 500, c.playerId); Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 532, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId); }

???

Read full topic

item.title: How can I add a drop that is given 100% of the time?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Oh I didn’t know this was PI.

Well what was wrong with

} else if (k1 == 23) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 384, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 500, c.playerId); Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 532, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId);

this?

@Vhenom wrote:

Okay well there really isn’t a beginning to the grounditem method (Closest thing I could find was Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 18169, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, c.getId()); ) but here’s the whole NPCHandler.java class http://pastebin.com/PwVZF9Pu and for the dropitem here it is http://pastebin.com/S58U5ydn

item.title: How can I add a drop that is given 100% of the time?
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

So the closest thing I could make out was this

} else if (k1 == 23) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 384, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 500, c.playerId); Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 532, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId);

But I don’t really get that code is there a place where I can input the NPC and it’s coords or something sort of confused?

item.title: How can I add a drop that is given 100% of the time?
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

So I went under the dropitems method but all I could find that I was able to add was this code

if (npcs[i].npcType == 9965) { c.getItems().addItem(4675, 1); }

and that works great but when the npc dies it adds the item to the players inventory. How could I make it drop it?

Read full topic
item.source: How can I add a drop that is given 100% of the time?

item.title: How can I add a drop that is given 100% of the time?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Vhenom:

Okay I did that, but how could I make it give 2 things like 1 bones and 1 air rune always? Because if I try to do two returns; then I get unreachable error

There’s already a switch statement for bones dropping, but for anything else

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:4, topic:445147”][quote author=Vhenom link=topic=547836.msg4016911#msg4016911 date=1339714759]
Okay I did that, but how could I make it give 2 things like 1 bones and 1 air rune always? Because if I try to do two returns; then I get unreachable error
[/quote]
Add it in the dropItems(int i) method.[/quote]

^

Read full topic

Okay I did that, but how could I make it give 2 things like 1 bones and 1 air rune always? Because if I try to do two returns; then I get unreachable error
